title: Collaboration For Commission Art Work
snippet: Looking for Numerous Artists that are open to collaboration for tshirt designs to fill out our website so the site can go live. We have a few designers that are submitting designs for print. We will also have Canvas Art that will be posted on the site for purchase. All design submissions will be vetted. Must be png at least 300 dpi. The vision for the site is to promote up and coming small time artist and to bring awareness and support to the Creative Community. All designs will be posted in the site for sale and we will pay out commissions based on sales.
